title: Child joins age-appropriate interest community
content:
Scenario: Child joins age-appropriate interest community
    Given Emma loves drawing manga-style art
    When she discovers a youth manga artists community in her region
    And the community is moderated and age-appropriate (ages 10-16)
    Then she can request to join through her parent's approval
    And her parents see the community charter and moderator information
    And upon approval, she gains access to the creative space
    And she can share art, get feedback, and learn techniques
    And all participants are age-verified and properly supervised
